name: Ritchie Tiongson
text: But if you have to go with the boring, outdated comic book versions, then I'd still do the basic principles used in the Incredibles: Keep the hero archetypes but give them personalities and characters that fit modern sensibilities. There's no reason to keep Reed as a high-functionin g sociopath career scientist, Sue as the Stepford trophy wife who can't help but fall in love with the working man, Ben as the lower class brute who gives way to the whims of his white collar master-best friend, and Johnny as the white male privileged dickhead who uses his looks, fame and disposable income to get what he wants.
